roleset.name: cardinal direction, figure and ground are separate

example.name: north-r
example.text: Ft. Collins is north of Loveland.

example.name: northern-j
example.text: The northern edge of the park

example.name: north-j
example.text: Uranus has 3 north poles-- one is north in terms of the ecliptic (the colloquial north pole), one is its own intrinsic north based on its rotation around its polar axis, and one is its magnetic north pole, which lies somewhere in its colloquial southern hemisphere.
